summary: Two friends who haven't seen each other for thirteen years reunite. One is a successful concert pianist just back from a European tour and the other has just started a new business.
cast: Sylvia Chang|Ming Hsu|Lieh Lee|David Mao|Terry Hu|Kun-Hou Chen|Hsiao-Hsien Hou|Hou Tao Hsiao|Hsiao-Yeh|Shu-Chen Hsu|Yu-Hua Huang|I-Chen Ko|Meng-Lin Li|Shu-Chen Li|Rui-Yang Lin|Wen-Cheng Lo|Fang Mei|Chun Nan|Jennifer O'Neal|Te-chen Tao|Chuang-Hsiang Tseng|Johnny Chung-Yi Tuan|Jen Wan|Nien-Jen Wu|Shao-Kang Wu|Feng-Chiao Yen|Shou-Jen Yu
title: Hai tan de yi tian
